body_html: I was looking at a few other AI toolkits to see if they require AVX support from the CPU. I could not find this to be the case. For example https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/cognitive-toolkit/ (CNTK) latest version works fine on my system.
body_text: I was looking at a few other AI toolkits to see if they require AVX support from the CPU. I could not find this to be the case. For example https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/cognitive-toolkit/ (CNTK) latest version works fine on my system.
body: I was looking at a few other AI toolkits to see if they require AVX support from the CPU. I could not find this to be the case. For example https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/cognitive-toolkit/ (CNTK) latest version works fine on my system.
